level.heading: Member approval of other disposition of assets.
level.text: A sale, lease, exchange, license, or other disposition of assets of a limited cooperative association, other than a disposition described in § 29-1014.01, shall require approval of the association's members under §§ 29-1014.03 and 29-1014.04 if the disposition leaves the association without significant continuing business activity.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on § 1502 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
